attributes.action: ask the Turkish government to allow Armenians to worship at the Church of Surp Khach on Akdamar island
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Turkey has renovated this 1,100-year-old church in the east of the country on Akdamar island on Lake Van.  Patriarch Mesrob II, spiritual leader of Turkey's tiny Armenian Orthodox community has asked that the government should open up the restored church for worship at least once a year.
